name: Level Jumper
description:
Play as ball as it tries to survive across different game types. The only things constant - the number of things trying to kill you.

Learn the patterns, dodge the spikes and collect the coins.

With 5 levels inspired by classic games including the Chrome Dinosaur Game, Pac-Man and even Pong (with a little twist).

Each time you survive a level, the next one is randomly chosen, leading to a different combination of progression each time you play.

You think you can survive through all the different levels in a single run?


P.S the repetition of levels isn't a glitch!

Made for the Extended Rigid Jam 1 

Time Limit =  1 Week
